'''Prognosticar From Afar''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Haggling With a Plant]] on the island of [[Dread Vine's Cove]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Only one crewmate is allowed to enter the islet with the Black Pearl.</big>
